item.description:
This event will take place Saturday afternoon, Sept 30. The movie starts at 4:40. Everyone who has as of now rsvp'd yes or maybe will be sent an email.

Thank you for your patience and I am wholeheartedly looking forward to meeting everyone who has waited for this movie and whose schedule works out so that they can make it.

As usual, I will be standing near the front row holding a Meet-Up sign at the end of the movie and then we'll walk over to one of the many restaurants or pubs near the theater for what should be a very lively discussion.

If you are new to the group this event was posted weeks ago with a poll to see who was interested. If you have not rsvp'd yet and would like to attend , please do.

Ticket prices are $8.50
There's a link below for one review of this movie.

For more information, see http://metromix.chica...
item.name: Little Miss Sunshine
